name: PRP® POWDER
description: PRP® Powder is for hydrocarbon spill clean up on oil, fuel and other liquid petroleums. PRP® Powder is especially well adapted for land, water and hard surface petroleum spills in areas such as industrial plant settings (such as cooling ponds and tanks), shorelines – whether rocky or sandy – marinas, railroad tracks, oil wells/oil fields, maintenance facilities, truck roll-overs, and marshes/wetlands remediation where PRP® can mitigate the collateral damage to the ecosystem caused by clean up crews.
